169167.<center>ゲルト海峡の 海上で待つ。\nトンネルを抜けてから ５秒後に\n:
Wait at sea in the Gert Strait. Five seconds
after you exit the tunnel, throw the ransom
out the window of the seat you are in.

169168.<center>無事に 受けわたしが完了して\n１００億ゴールド 手に入ったら\:
Once the transfer is successfully completed
and I have 10 billion gold, I will return the
Black Mannequin Statue to you.

169169.……海賊たちは ゲルト海峡で待っているらしい。\n<pc>は １００億の身代金を:
The pirates are said to be waiting in the Gert
Strait. <pc> waited for the train to
pass Gert Strait with 10 Billion Ransom...

169171.「こんにちは～。こちらの リーネさん宛ての\n お手紙を お届けにあがりました～:
Hello. I'm here to deliver your letter to Ms.
Renee here.

169174.「いったい 誰からだろう？\n よくある ワケのわかんない\n 投資案内とかじゃ:
Who could it be from? I hope it's not one of
those obscure investment guides that are so
common.

169175.「これは……写真？\n なになに えっと……:
Is this... a picture? What, what, what,
what...

169176.「親愛なるマヌケへ。俺は 海賊スクアーロだ。\n お宝を 返してほしければ 写真:
Dear Dumbass. I am Pirate Squalo. If you want
your treasure back, bring me the 10 Billion
Ransom gold to the place in the picture...!

178838.「いいか オマエら。女ってのは ロマンチックな\n ムードってヤツに弱い。:
Listen, you guys. Women have a weakness for
romantic moods.

178839.「あとはとにかく こう\n キラキラ～ってしたモンが 好きなんだよ！: I also like things that sparkle!

178840.「だから 夜景のキレイな ロケーションで\n 甘～い言葉を 耳元でささやけば\n:
So, if I whisper sweet words in your ear in a
beautiful location with a night view, you will
fall in love with me!

178841.「だから今度 酒場のリンダちゃん……\n まぁ あの娘は 絶対 俺に気があるんだ:
So the next time Linda from the tavern... well, I'm pretty sure she has a thing for me... she's the one I want to take on a date
to someplace with a beautiful night view...

178843.「なッ……お前は リーネ！！\n どうやって ここにッ！？: You... you... Renee! How did you get in here?

178844.「どうやって？ 舟に決まってんでしょ。\n その首の上に くっついてんのは 風船:
How? A boat, of course. Is that a balloon
attached to its neck?

178845.「チッ。相変わらず くそムカつく女だぜ。\n あの頃から ちっとも変わらねぇ……:
Damn. She's still the same annoying bitch. You haven't changed a bit since those days... we're the villainous pirates that even a
crying child won't shut up about!

178846.「……ん？ あの頃？\n なんの話を しているんだ？\n 私は お前なんか 知ら:
Hmm? Back then? What are you talking about? I
don't know you.

178847.「ふっ……ざけンなッ！ 俺は お前への\n 復讐のために ここまで やってるんだ:
Don't... fuck it! I'm going this far to get
revenge on you!

178848.「うーん。復讐されるようなことを\n アンタにした覚え まったく ないんだけど…:
Hmmm. I don't remember doing anything to you
to get revenge, but...

178849.「えっと～ 人ちがいじゃ ございません？: I'm sorry, I think you've got the wrong guy.

178850.「んなワケあるかッ！\n あの時のことを 忘れたとは言わせねぇぞ……:
No way! Don't tell me you've forgotten what
happened...

178851.「俺は 酒場で働きながら アイドルを目指す\n ピーチちゃんって娘に ずっと\n:
I've had a crush on a girl named Peach-chan
who works at a tavern and aspires to be an
idol. Then one day...

178852.「彼女は 大事なオーディションをひかえて\n おしゃれさが上がる 指輪をほしがっ:
She had an important audition coming up and wanted a ring that would make her look stylish. I promised her I would make sure she
received it.

178853.「そして 俺は お前の店で 合成を依頼した。\n うまいこといったよ！ と言われ:
And I asked for a composite at your store. It
worked! I gave her the ring as soon as she
told me. The next day...

178854.「俺は 彼女に 強烈な平手打ちを 食らった。\n そう……お前が 合成でつけた効:
I gave her a hard slap. Yes... the effect you
synthesized wasn't fashionable, it was fun!

178855.「俺の愛の指輪を あんなスクラップにして\n なーにが 気に入ってくれるといいな:
I hope you like my ring of love after you made
such a scrap of it! You sorcerer!

178856.「俺の ピーチちゃんを 返せよバカ！！: Give me back my Peach-chan, you idiot!

178857.「はァ！？ ちゃんと 合成効果ついてんじゃん！: What? It's got a composite effect!

178858.「っていうか 合成効果ぐらいで フラれるなんて\n アンタが その程度の男だった:
I mean, if you're rejected because of a
synthetic effect, it means you're just that
good of a guy, right?

178859.「そういう 自分の魅力の無さを 棚に上げて\n 他人の足ばっか引っぱろうとする:
You're the one who's trying to drag others
down while putting your own unattractiveness
on the back burner, you dowdy piece of shit!

178861.「テメェら！ コイツらまとめて\n 海に 沈めてやれェーーーーーッ！！: You guys! Sink them all in the sea!

178862.「<cs_pchero>！\n 私は ザコをまとめて つぶすから\n スクアーロ:
<cs_pchero>! I'll crush all the punks
together and you can deal with Squalo!!!!

178864.「俺たちは……いくつもの 漁村をつぶした\n 最強の 極悪海賊団なんだぞ……クソ:
We're the most evil pirates... who have
destroyed several fishing villages... damn it!

178865.「ハッ！ あーはっはっはっは！\n アンタたち やっぱ 面白いわ。: Ha! Ha-ha-ha! You guys are funny.

178866.「いいことを 教えてあげよう！\n 私ぐらいになると 買った覚えもない恨みが\n:
Let me tell you something! When you're my age, you get delivery after delivery from all over the world of grudges you don't even remember
buying.

178867.「私が 生きているのが 気に入らない連中が\n どうやら この世界には 大勢いる:
Apparently there are a lot of people in this
world who don't like the fact that I'm alive.

178868.「おかげで 信頼できるのは 数少ない身内だけ。\n 常に 命を狙われてるから\n:
Thanks to this, I can only trust a few people
in my life. I can't even go on dates with them
because they're always trying to kill me.

178869.「アンタたちは いいね。\n 弱い者いじめだけ してりゃいいんだから。:
You guys are good. All you have to do is bully
the weak.

178872.「ヘッ……ザマァみろ。\n このスクアーロ様は 転んでも\n タダじゃ 起きねー:
Well...fuck you. This Master Squalo doesn't
get up just by falling down...

178874.「にゃほー！ やっと 自由になれたニャ～！\n もう せまい所 疲れたニャン。\:
Meow! I'm finally free! I'm tired of being in a confined space. I'm tired of being in a small place. I want to groom it as much as I
can!

178875.「なっ……なんだ コイツ！？: What the hell is this guy?

178877.「オイラ デビルニャン。ヒトの財産を\n 根こそぎ奪う 最凶の悪霊として\n 恐:
I, Devil Cat. I am feared as the evilest of
all evil spirits, who will take all of
mankind's possessions! Bow down!

178878.「……ニャッ！ あんなところに\n ゴールドが あるじゃニャいか！: Oh, no! There's gold in that place!

178880.「あそーれ！ おっしごっと おっしごっと\n はっじめっるニャーン！ おカネは:
Let's go! Oshigotte, oshigotte, oshigotte
shimmy, shimmy, shimmy, shimmy! All the money
is confiscated! All the money is confiscated!

178884.「でもオイラ ずっと 休んでたから\n お仕事 いっぱい たまってるニャン！:
But I've been on vacation for a long time, so
I've got a lot of work piling up!

178886.「久々だから はりきって お仕事するニャ～！\n 世界中の お金持ちを み～んな:
It's been a long time since I've worked with you, so I'm going to work hard! I'm going to make all the rich people in the world into
bimbos!

178888.「<cs_pchero>。\n ここにいても ラチが明かないから\n いったん:
<cs_pchero>. Let's go back to Verinard since
we're not going to get anywhere staying here.

178889.「早く アイツを捕まえないと……。: We have to get him soon...

178890.<cs_pchero>とリーネは スクアーロ海賊団を\n衛士団へ突きだし ヴェリ:
<cs_pchero> and Renee turned the Pirate
Squaloes over to the Guard and returned to the
Accessory Shop in Verinard Castle Town...

178891.「<cs_pchero>！ よかった！\n ザコどもは 私がなんとかするから\n:
<cs_pchero>! Thank God! I'll take care of
the zakos, you just deal with Squalo!!!!
